Time of Poll) (No. 2) Order, 2018
WHEREASinpursuanceofArticle72(8)oftheConstitution,the Cap.1
Speaker of the National Assembly has informed the Electoral
CommissionofZambiaofthevacancyinrespectofKasenengwa
ConstituencyNo.41byreasonofthedeathofMsVictoriaKalima,
Member of Parliament for Kasenengwa Constituency, and the
declarationbytheSpeakeroftheNationalAssemblyofthevacancy
of the Parliamentaryseat of the Kasenengwa Constituency.
NOWTHEREFORE,inexerciseofthepowerscontainedinArticle
57 (3) of the Constitution andRegulation 15(1) of the Electoral Cap.1
Process(General)Regulations,2016,the followingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Assembly By- Title
Election (Kasenengwa ConstituencyNo. 41) (Election Date and
TimeofPoll)(No.2)Order,2018.
2. A candidate for election as a Member of Parliament for Nomination
forelections

3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 9th Campaign
